text: So - see the next page! Yes, they are waiting for you. But there is no need to be frightened. The audience will eat out of your hand - if they like what you offer them. A good start will put them in a good humour. Ladies and gentlemen! I'm afraid I have not had much experience of public speaking.
handwritten_text: So - see the next page! Yes, they are waiting for you. But there is no need to be frightened. The audience will eat out of your hand - if they like what you offer them. A good start will put them in a good humour. Ladies and gentlemen! I'm afraid I have not had much experience of public speaking.
